item.description:
Introduction Gatherings- Singles Dance
45-65 age bracket

Mission:

Experience the Joy of Dancing and meeting new friends. And find a lifetime, monogamous partner or marriage.

Format: Time 7:00pm-10:30PM
7:00pm-8:30pm Music, DJ-volume lowered to meet new people
8:31-10:30pm Music volume is raised to dance
Values: We are all nice, kind, respectful, friendly, non smokers.

Ask you to walk the talk by saying yes once to anyone who asks you to dance. Honor them!

Ticket prices- two options: at the door
Blue name tag-$12:00- includes dancing, meeting new people, soft drinks, cheese, crackers, fruit, assortment of breads.

Red name Tag- $20.00-Open bar-Two classes of wine-honor code. Plus dancing, meeting new people, soft drinks, cheese crackers, fruit, and assortment of breads.

After 8:30pm fee is additional $5.00
Old Town Hall
Bedford, MA
Enter through side door, take elevator to 3rd floor. Introduce yourself to people in the elevator.

And Experience the magic,elegance and romantic environment of the magnificent Grand Ballroom with gleaming hardwood floors-
Dates - Sept 8th and the 22nd

Register now: Room capacity is 200 attendees. Enter the number of guests you will attend with.

Park anywhere around the green.
item.name: Introduction Gatherings - Dance - Singles
